content: materials up to 10 yards of any scrap yarn 2 0mm -3 0mm hook depending on yarn needle for weaving in ends 2 ½ square of cardboard small-toothed comb 2 fish hook ear-wires flat-nosed jewelry pliers pattern notes all directions are written in american crochet terms gauge is not essential for this project but tight stitches will result in an earring that holds its shape better any fiber may be used but you may want to check how the plies separate by giving them a comb first this pattern can be worked in any size crochet yarn and appropriate hook experiment with different size yarn and hooks to achieve smaller or larger earrings stitch key chain = chain stitch ehdc = extended half_double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st s = stitch es want a coupon code to get one of my earring patterns for free sign up for the bliss this newsletter 1 to receive your code newsletter sign up http //eepurl com/gv7nud ©2019 amber bliss calderón all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use you may not alter sell copy transfer trade or distribute this pattern or its images you may not claim this pattern as your own you are welcome to sell items created from this pattern but please credit bliss this or amber bliss calderón as the pattern designer follow bliss this on instagram https //www instagram com/amberblissthis/ follow bliss this on facebook https //www facebook com/blissthisbyamber/ 1 https //dashboard mailerlite com/forms/1215327/158595135935874489/share
